user.title: ActronAir OAuth2 Authorization
user.description:
To authorize your ActronAir account:

1. Go to: {verification_uri}
2. Enter code: **{user_code}**
3. Complete authorization within {expires_minutes} minutes

Click **Submit** after completing authorization.
